snippet: A Somali-American man was sentenced to 30 years in prison for plotting to bomb a Christmas tree-lighting ceremony in Portland’s town square in 2010.
abstract: Somali-American man Mohamed Mohamud is sentenced to 30 years in prison for plotting to bomb a Christmas tree-lighting ceremony in Portland, Ore, town square in 2010.
lead_paragraph: A Somali-American man was sentenced to 30 years in prison for plotting to bomb a Christmas tree-lighting ceremony in Portland’s town square in 2010.
